<h3 id="X22520">X(22520) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th ANTI-BROCARD AND 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b+c)^2*a^4+2*(b+c)*b*c*a^3-(b^4+c^4-(2*b^2-b*c+2*c^2)*b*c)*a^2-(b-c)^2*b^2*c^2)  :  :
<p>X(22520) lies on these lines:
{3,11490}, {32,56}, {36,10789}, {55,10800}, {83,958}, {98,22753}, {104,10788}, {182,3428}, {384,22779}, {727,4257}, {956,10791}, {995,4279}, {999,11364}, {2080,10269}, {2975,7787}, {3398,11249}, {4027,22514}, {5253,7793}, {6196,16476}, {7976,17034}, {10790,22654}, {10793,22757}, {10794,12110}, {10796,22758}, {10797,22759}, {10798,22760}, {10799,10804}, {10801,22766}, {10802,22767}, {10803,22768}, {11194,12150}, {11380,22479}, {11492,11838}, {11493,11837}, {11839,22755}, {11840,22761}, {11841,22762}, {11842,22765}, {12176,22504}, {12191,22565}, {12192,22583}, {12193,22659}, {12195,12513}, {12196,18237}, {12197,22770}, {12198,12773}, {12199,22775}, {12200,22777}, {12201,19478}, {12202,22778}, {12204,22774}, {12205,22773}, {12206,22780}, {12207,19159}, {12208,22781}, {12209,22782}, {12210,22595}, {12211,22624}, {12212,22769}, {13193,22586}, {13194,22560}, {13195,19162}, {13672,22783}, {13743,16115}, {13792,22784}, {13885,22763}, {13938,22764}, {17023,21010}, {18502,18761}, {18993,19013}, {18994,19014}, {22521,22680}, {22522,22771}, {22523,22772}, {22524,22776}</p>

X(22520) = {X(3), X(12194)}-harmonic conjugate of X(11490)<br>
